title: Boris Johnson news live: Latest updates as DUP shatters PM's hopes of Brexit deal
text:
Boris Johnson has been dealt a major blow only hours before the crunch EU summit after DUP leader Arlene Foster said she could not yet support his Brexit plan.

The prime minister had been hoping to bring back a deal from the Brussels meeting of European leaders while winning the backing of the DUP, which wields strong influence over Tory Brexiteers.

Mr Johnson needs to get a deal approved in the Commons by Saturday if he is to avoid asking the EU for an extension to the current October 31 deadline, a delay required by the Benn Act.
